en.latex:
[IEB 2019]</br>
Give three values of \(k\) for which the \(x\)-intercepts of \(y=(2 x-1)^{2}+k\) will be real, rational and unequal.
en.html:
[IEB 2019]</br>
Give three values of \(k\) for which the \(x\)-intercepts of \(y=(2 x-1)^{2}+k\) will be real, rational and unequal.

af.latex:
[IEB 2019]</br>
Gee drie waardes van \(k\) waarvoor die \(x\)-afsnitte van \(y=(2 x-1)^{2}+k\) reël, rasionaal en ongelyk sal wees.
af.html:
[IEB 2019]</br>
Gee drie waardes van \(k\) waarvoor die \(x\)-afsnitte van \(y=(2 x-1)^{2}+k\) reël, rasionaal en ongelyk sal wees.

en.latex:
\(y=4 x^{2}-4 x+(1+k)\)</br>
For real, unequal and rational, \(\Delta>0\) and perfect square</br>
\(\Delta=(-4)^{2}-4(4)(1+k)\)</br>
\(\Delta=-16 k\)</br>
\(\therefore k=-1, k=-\frac{1}{4}, k=-\frac{1}{16}\) etc.</br></br>

OR</br></br>

\(y=4 x^{2}-4 x+(1+k)\)</br>
Solve for \(4 x^{2}-4 x+(1+k)=0\) through trial & improvement:</br>
When \(k=-1\) roots are real, rational \(\&\) unequal </br>
When \(k=-4\) roots are real, rational \(\&\) unequal, etc.
en.html:
\(y=4 x^{2}-4 x+(1+k)\)</br>
For real, unequal and rational, \(\Delta>0\) and perfect square</br>
\(\Delta=(-4)^{2}-4(4)(1+k)\)</br>
\(\Delta=-16 k\)</br>
\(\therefore k=-1, k=-\frac{1}{4}, k=-\frac{1}{16}\) etc.</br></br>

OR</br></br>

\(y=4 x^{2}-4 x+(1+k)\)</br>
Solve for \(4 x^{2}-4 x+(1+k)=0\) through trial & improvement:</br>
When \(k=-1\) roots are real, rational \(\&\) unequal </br>
When \(k=-4\) roots are real, rational \(\&\) unequal, etc.

af.latex:
\(y=4 x^{2}-4 x+(1+k)\)</br>
Vir reëel, ongelyk en rasionaal, \(\Delta>0\) en volkome vierkant</br>
\(\Delta=(-4)^{2}-4(4)(1+k)\)</br>
\(\Delta=-16 k\)</br>
\(\therefore k=-1, k=-\frac{1}{4}, k=-\frac{1}{16}\) ens.</br></br>

OF</br></br>

\(y=4 x^{2}-4 x+(1+k)\)</br>
Los op vir \(4 x^{2}-4 x+(1+k)=0\) deur probeer en tref:</br>
Wanneer \(k=-1:\) wortels is reëel, rasionaal en ongelyk </br>
Wanneer \(k=-4:\) wortels is reëel, rasionaal en ongelyk, ens.
af.html:
\(y=4 x^{2}-4 x+(1+k)\)</br>
Vir reëel, ongelyk en rasionaal, \(\Delta>0\) en volkome vierkant</br>
\(\Delta=(-4)^{2}-4(4)(1+k)\)</br>
\(\Delta=-16 k\)</br>
\(\therefore k=-1, k=-\frac{1}{4}, k=-\frac{1}{16}\) ens.</br></br>

OF</br></br>

\(y=4 x^{2}-4 x+(1+k)\)</br>
Los op vir \(4 x^{2}-4 x+(1+k)=0\) deur probeer en tref:</br>
Wanneer \(k=-1:\) wortels is reëel, rasionaal en ongelyk </br>
Wanneer \(k=-4:\) wortels is reëel, rasionaal en ongelyk, ens.

Determine the ratio \(P: Q\).

en.latex:
[IEB 2019]</br>
Rewrite the equation \(a^{2 x}=3^{x+1}\) in the form \(x=\ldots\)
en.html:
[IEB 2019]</br>
Rewrite the equation \(a^{2 x}=3^{x+1}\) in the form \(x=\ldots\)

af.latex:
[IEB 2019]</br>
Herskryf die vergelyking \(a^{2 x}=3^{x+1}\) in die vorm \(x=\ldots\)
af.html:
[IEB 2019]</br>
Herskryf die vergelyking \(a^{2 x}=3^{x+1}\) in die vorm \(x=\ldots\)

en.latex:
$$
\begin{aligned}
a^{2 x} &=3^{x+1} \\
\frac{a^{2 x}}{3^{x}} &=3 \\
\left(\frac{a^{2}}{3}\right)^{x} &=3 \\
\log 3_{\left(\frac{1}{3} a^{2}\right)} &=x
\end{aligned}
$$

OR

$$
x=\log _{\frac{a^{2}}{3}} 3
$$


OR

$$
x=\frac{\log 3}{\log a^{2}-\log 3}
$$
en.html:

The graphs of \(f(x)=\frac{1}{2}(x+5)^{2}-8\) and \(g(x)=\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{9}{2}\) are sketched. 
</br>
</br>
\(\bullet\) \(\mathrm{A}\) is the turning point of \(f\). </br>
\(\bullet\) The axis of symmetry of \(f\) intersects the \(x\) -axis at  \(\mathrm{E}\) and the line \(g\) at \(\mathrm{D}(m ; n)\).
 </br>
\(\bullet\) \(\mathrm{C}\) is the \(y\) -intercept of \(f\) and \(g\).

[IEB 2020]</br>

Die grafieke het 'n gemeenskaplike \(x\) -afsnit by \(C\). </br>
Die grafiek van \(f\) het 'n \(y\) -afsnit by \(D\). </br>
Die asimptoot van \(f\) en die grafiek van \(g\) gaan albei deur \(A(2 ;-1)\). </br>
EBA is 'n lyn loodreg op die \(x\) -as.

en.latex:
[IEB 2020]</br>
The Maputo-Katembe twin tower bridge extends over the Maputo Bay. The diagram shows a representation of a suspension cable above the mean water level.</br></br>

The height \(h\) in metres of the suspension cable at a horizontal distance \(x\) metres from the base of the left tower can be modelled by the function \(h=k(x-a)^{2}+b\).</br></br>

At the mid-point between the two towers, the suspension cables are \(190\) metres above the mean water level. The distance between the towers is \(1 \ 450\) metres and the towers are both \(315\) metres tall, measured from the mean water level \((x\) -axis).</br></br>

A hygrometer (shown as \(A\) in the diagram ) to measure humidity is placed on the cable at a height of \(210\) metres above the mean water level.
en.html:
[IEB 2020]</br>
The Maputo-Katembe twin tower bridge extends over the Maputo Bay. The diagram shows a representation of a suspension cable above the mean water level.</br></br>

The height \(h\) in metres of the suspension cable at a horizontal distance \(x\) metres from the base of the left tower can be modelled by the function \(h=k(x-a)^{2}+b\).</br></br>

At the mid-point between the two towers, the suspension cables are \(190\) metres above the mean water level. The distance between the towers is \(1 \ 450\) metres and the towers are both \(315\) metres tall, measured from the mean water level \((x\) -axis).</br></br>

A hygrometer (shown as \(A\) in the diagram ) to measure humidity is placed on the cable at a height of \(210\) metres above the mean water level.

af.latex:
[IEB 2020]</br>
Die Maputo-Katembe-dubbeltoringbrug oorspan die Maputobaai. Die diagram toon 'n voorstelling van 'n hangkabel bokant die gemiddelde watervlak.</br></br>

Die hoogte \(h\) in meter van die hangkabel op 'n horisontale afstand \(x\) meter van die basis van die linkertoring af kan gemodelleer word deur die funksie \(h=k(x-a)^{2}+b\).</br></br>

By die middelpunt tussen die twee torings is die hangkabels \(190\) meter bokant die gemiddelde watervlak. Die afstand tussen die torings is \(1 \ 450\) meter en die torings is albei \(315\) meter hoog, gemeet van die gemiddelde watervlak \((x\) -as) af.</br></br>

'n Higrometer (in die diagram  as \(A\) getoon) om humiditeit te meet, word op 'n hoogte van \(210\) meter bokant die gemiddelde watervlak op die kabel geplaas.
af.html:
[IEB 2020]</br>
Die Maputo-Katembe-dubbeltoringbrug oorspan die Maputobaai. Die diagram toon 'n voorstelling van 'n hangkabel bokant die gemiddelde watervlak.</br></br>

Die hoogte \(h\) in meter van die hangkabel op 'n horisontale afstand \(x\) meter van die basis van die linkertoring af kan gemodelleer word deur die funksie \(h=k(x-a)^{2}+b\).</br></br>

By die middelpunt tussen die twee torings is die hangkabels \(190\) meter bokant die gemiddelde watervlak. Die afstand tussen die torings is \(1 \ 450\) meter en die torings is albei \(315\) meter hoog, gemeet van die gemiddelde watervlak \((x\) -as) af.</br></br>

'n Higrometer (in die diagram  as \(A\) getoon) om humiditeit te meet, word op 'n hoogte van \(210\) meter bokant die gemiddelde watervlak op die kabel geplaas.

en.latex:
[NCS 2019]
Shown are the graphs of \(f(x)=x^{2}+b x-3\) and \(g(x)=\dfrac{a}{x+p}\).

\(\bullet\) \(f\) has a turning point at \(\mathrm{C}\) and passes through the \(x\) -axis at \((1 ; 0)\).
\(\bullet\) \(\mathrm{D}\) is the \(y\) -intercept of both \(f\) and \(g\). The graphs \(f\) and \(g\) also intersect each other at \(\mathrm{E}\) and \({J}\).
\(\bullet\) The vertical asymptote of \(g\) passes through the \(x\) -intercept of \(f\).
en.html:
[NCS 2019]
Shown are the graphs of \(f(x)=x^{2}+b x-3\) and \(g(x)=\dfrac{a}{x+p}\).

\(\bullet\) \(f\) has a turning point at \(\mathrm{C}\) and passes through the \(x\) -axis at \((1 ; 0)\).
\(\bullet\) \(\mathrm{D}\) is the \(y\) -intercept of both \(f\) and \(g\). The graphs \(f\) and \(g\) also intersect each other at \(\mathrm{E}\) and \({J}\).
\(\bullet\) The vertical asymptote of \(g\) passes through the \(x\) -intercept of \(f\).

af.latex:
[NCS 2019]
Gewys is die grafieke van \(f(x)=x^{2}+b x-3\) en \(g(x)=\dfrac{a}{x+p}\).

\(\bullet\) \(f\) het 'n draaipunt by \(\mathrm{C}\) en sny die \(x\) -as by \((1 ; 0)\).
\(\bullet\) \(D\) is die \(y\) -afsnit van beide \(f\) en \(g .\) Die grafieke \(f\) en \(g\) sny mekaar ook by \(E\) en \(J\).
\(\bullet\) Die vertikale asimptoot van \(g\) gaan deur die \(x\) -afsnit van \(f\).
af.html:
[NCS 2019]
Gewys is die grafieke van \(f(x)=x^{2}+b x-3\) en \(g(x)=\dfrac{a}{x+p}\).

\(\bullet\) \(D\) is die \(y\) -afsnit van beide \(f\) en \(g .\) Die grafieke \(f\) en \(g\) sny mekaar ook by \(E\) en \(J\).
\(\bullet\) Die vertikale asimptoot van \(g\) gaan deur die \(x\) -afsnit van \(f\).

af.html: Beskryf hoe jy die grafiek vertikaal sal skuif sodat die \(x\)-afsnitte reëel en gelyk is.

en.latex: Determine the values of \(x\), represented on this sketch, for which \(f(x)>g(x)\).
en.html: Determine the values of \(x\), represented on this sketch, for which \(f(x)>g(x)\).

af.latex: Bepaal die waardes van \(x\), wat op hierdie skets voorgestel word, waarvoor \(f(x)>g(x)\)
af.html: Bepaal die waardes van \(x\), wat op hierdie skets voorgestel word, waarvoor \(f(x)>g(x)\)

en.latex:
$$
\begin{aligned}
g(x) &=\log _{a} x \text { subst. }(3 ; 1) \\
1 &=\log _{a} 3 \\
a &=3 \\
f(x) &=\sqrt{k x} \text { subst. }(3 ; 1) \\
1 &=\sqrt{3 k} \\
(1)^{2} &=(\sqrt{3 k})^{2} \\
k &=\frac{1}{3}
\end{aligned}
$$
en.html:
$$
\begin{aligned}
g(x) &=\log _{a} x \text { subst. }(3 ; 1) \\
1 &=\log _{a} 3 \\
a &=3 \\
f(x) &=\sqrt{k x} \text { subst. }(3 ; 1) \\
1 &=\sqrt{3 k} \\
(1)^{2} &=(\sqrt{3 k})^{2} \\
k &=\frac{1}{3}
\end{aligned}
$$

$$

en.latex: Determine \(f^{-1}\), the inverse of \(f\) in the form \(y=\ldots\), and state its domain.
en.html: Determine \(f^{-1}\), the inverse of \(f\) in the form \(y=\ldots\), and state its domain.

af.latex: Bepaal \(f^{-1}\), die inverse van \(f\), in die vorm \(y=\ldots\) en gee die definisiegebied daarvan.
af.html: Bepaal \(f^{-1}\), die inverse van \(f\), in die vorm \(y=\ldots\) en gee die definisiegebied daarvan.

en.latex:
$$
\begin{aligned}
f: y &=\sqrt{\frac{1}{3} x}\\
f^{-1}: x &=\sqrt{\frac{1}{3} y}\\
x^{2} &=\frac{1}{3} y\\
y &=3 x^{2} \text { for } x \geq 0
\end{aligned}
$$

$$

y &=3 x^{2} \text { for } x \geq 0
\end{aligned}
$$

en.latex:
$$
\begin{aligned}
\text { Area trapezium } &=\frac{1}{2}(\mathrm{DE}+\mathrm{OC}) \times \mathrm{OE} \\
&=\frac{1}{2}(2+4,5) \times 5 \\
&=\frac{65}{4} \text { or } 16,25
\end{aligned}
$$

OR

$$
\begin{aligned}
\text { Area } \Delta &=\frac{1}{2} b \cdot h \\
&=\frac{1}{2}(5)\left(\frac{5}{2}\right) \\
&=\frac{25}{4} \\
\text { Area rect } &=b \cdot h \\
&=(5)(2) \\
&=10\\
\text { Area trapezium } &=\frac{25}{4}+10=\frac{65}{4} \text { or } 16,25
\end{aligned}
$$

OR

$$
\begin{aligned}
\text { Area } \Delta \mathrm{SOC} &=\frac{1}{2} b \cdot h \\
&=\frac{1}{2}(9)\left(\frac{9}{2}\right) \\
&=\frac{81}{4}\\
&\text { Area } \Delta \mathrm{SED}=\frac{1}{2} b . h=\frac{1}{2}(4)(2)=4 \\
&\text { Area trapezium }=\text { area } \Delta \mathrm{SOC}-\text { Area } \Delta \mathrm{SED} \\
&=\frac{81}{4}-4 \\
&=\frac{65}{4} \text { or } 16,25
\end{aligned}
$$
en.html:
$$
\begin{aligned}
\text { Area trapezium } &=\frac{1}{2}(\mathrm{DE}+\mathrm{OC}) \times \mathrm{OE} \\
&=\frac{1}{2}(2+4,5) \times 5 \\
&=\frac{65}{4} \text { or } 16,25
\end{aligned}
$$

OR

$$
\begin{aligned}
\text { Area } \Delta &=\frac{1}{2} b \cdot h \\
&=\frac{1}{2}(5)\left(\frac{5}{2}\right) \\
&=\frac{25}{4} \\
\text { Area rect } &=b \cdot h \\
&=(5)(2) \\
&=10\\
\text { Area trapezium } &=\frac{25}{4}+10=\frac{65}{4} \text { or } 16,25
\end{aligned}
$$

OR

$$
\begin{aligned}
\text { Area } \Delta \mathrm{SOC} &=\frac{1}{2} b \cdot h \\
&=\frac{1}{2}(9)\left(\frac{9}{2}\right) \\
&=\frac{81}{4}\\
&\text { Area } \Delta \mathrm{SED}=\frac{1}{2} b . h=\frac{1}{2}(4)(2)=4 \\
&\text { Area trapezium }=\text { area } \Delta \mathrm{SOC}-\text { Area } \Delta \mathrm{SED} \\
&=\frac{81}{4}-4 \\
&=\frac{65}{4} \text { or } 16,25
\end{aligned}
$$

en.latex: Determine the values of \(x\) for which \(h(x)<1\).
en.html: Determine the values of \(x\) for which \(h(x)<1\).

en.latex:
$$
\begin{aligned}
&\frac{27}{3^{x}}<1 \\
&3^{x}>27 \\
&3^{x}>3^{3} \\
&x>3
\end{aligned}
$$

OR

$$
\begin{array}{r}
3^{-x+3}<1 \\
3^{-x+3}<3^{0} \\
-x+3<0 \\
x>3
\end{array}
$$

OR</br>
</br></br>
The graph shifts 3 units to the right Thus the \(y\) -intercept shift 3 units to the right \((3 ; 1)\) \(\therefore x>3\)

$$

$$
\begin{aligned}

2 &=-1+c\\
c &=3\\
y &=-x+3
\end{aligned}
$$

OR

\begin{aligned}
y-{y_1} &=m(x-{x_1})\\
y-2 &=-1(x-1)\\
y-2 &=x+1\\
y &=-x+3
\end{aligned}
$$

OR

$$
\begin{aligned}
y &=-(x-p)+q\\
y &=-(x-1)+2\\
y &=-x+3
\end{aligned}
$$

en.latex: Determine the value of \(t\) in \(g(x)=\log _{t} x\)

en.latex:
$$
\begin{aligned}
&\text { X-int. of normal/standard log graph is always: }\\
&(1 ; 0) \text { since } \log _{t} 1=0\\
&\therefore C(1 ; 0)
\end{aligned}
$$

OR

$$
\begin{aligned}
&\text { For Co-ord. of } C \text { : X-int, let } y=0\\
&y=\log _{\frac{1}{2}} x\\
&0=\log _{\frac{1}{2}} x\\
&x=\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{0}\\
&x=1\\
&\therefore \mathrm{C}(1 ; 0)
\end{aligned}
$$

$$
\begin{aligned}
&\text { X-int. of normal/standard log graph is always: }\\
&(1 ; 0) \text { since } \log _{t} 1=0\\

\end{aligned}
$$

&\therefore \mathrm{C}(1 ; 0)
\end{aligned}
$$

$$

OF

$$

y &=2 \times\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{0}-1\\
y &=1\\
\therefore \mathrm{D} &(0 ; 1)
\end{aligned}
$$

en.latex: Calculate the horizontal distance of the hygrometer from the left tower. Show all working.
en.html: Calculate the horizontal distance of the hygrometer from the left tower. Show all working.

af.latex: Bereken die horisontale afstand van die higrometer van die linkertoring af. Toon alle berekeninge.
af.html: Bereken die horisontale afstand van die higrometer van die linkertoring af. Toon alle berekeninge.

en.latex:
$$
\begin{aligned}
h &=k(x-a)^{2}+b \\
h &=k(x-725)^{2}+190 \text { sub. }(0 ; 315) \\
315 &=k(0-725)^{2}+190 \\
k &=\frac{1}{4205} \\
h &=\frac{1}{4205}(x-725)^{2}+190 \quad \ldots \text { sub. }(x ; 210) \\
210 &=\frac{1}{4205}(x-725)^{2}+190 \\
x &=1015 \text { or } x=435\\
\end{aligned}
$$

Therefore the horizontal distance of hygrometer from the left tower is \(435\) m.
en.html:
$$
\begin{aligned}
h &=k(x-a)^{2}+b \\
h &=k(x-725)^{2}+190 \text { sub. }(0 ; 315) \\
315 &=k(0-725)^{2}+190 \\
k &=\frac{1}{4205} \\
h &=\frac{1}{4205}(x-725)^{2}+190 \quad \ldots \text { sub. }(x ; 210) \\
210 &=\frac{1}{4205}(x-725)^{2}+190 \\
x &=1015 \text { or } x=435\\
\end{aligned}
$$

Therefore the horizontal distance of hygrometer from the left tower is \(435\) m.

af.latex:
$$
\begin{aligned}
h &=k(x-a)^{2}+b \\
h &=k(x-725)^{2}+190 \text { vervang }(0 ; 315) \\
315 &=k(0-725)^{2}+190 \\
k &=\frac{1}{4205} \\
h &=\frac{1}{4205}(x-725)^{2}+190 \quad \ldots \text { vervang }(x ; 210) \\
210 &=\frac{1}{4205}(x-725)^{2}+190 \\
x &=1015 \text { of } x=435\\
\end{aligned}
$$

Dus is die horisontale afstand van die higrometer van die linkertoring  \(435\) m.
af.html:
$$
\begin{aligned}
h &=k(x-a)^{2}+b \\
h &=k(x-725)^{2}+190 \text { vervang }(0 ; 315) \\
315 &=k(0-725)^{2}+190 \\
k &=\frac{1}{4205} \\
h &=\frac{1}{4205}(x-725)^{2}+190 \quad \ldots \text { vervang }(x ; 210) \\
210 &=\frac{1}{4205}(x-725)^{2}+190 \\
x &=1015 \text { of } x=435\\
\end{aligned}
$$

Dus is die horisontale afstand van die higrometer van die linkertoring  \(435\) m.

af.html: Is die reguit lyn, wat in vorige bepaal is, 'n raaklyn aan \(f ?\) Verduidelik jou antwoord.

en.latex:
No, the line passes through \(\mathrm{C}\) and \(\mathrm{D}\)
\(OR\)
No, a tangent through turning point \(\mathrm{C}\) will have a gradient of \(0\)
en.html:
No, the line passes through \(\mathrm{C}\) and \(\mathrm{D}\)
\(OR\)
No, a tangent through turning point \(\mathrm{C}\) will have a gradient of \(0\)

af.latex:
Nee, die lyn sny deur \(\mathrm{C}\) en \(\mathrm{D}\)
\(OF\)
Nee, `n raaklyn deur die draaipunt \(\mathrm{C}\) sal `n gradiënt van \(0\) he.
af.html:
Nee, die lyn sny deur \(\mathrm{C}\) en \(\mathrm{D}\)
\(OF\)

en.latex: The function \(h(x)=f(m-x)+q\) has only one \(x\) -intercept at \(x=0 .\) Determine the values of \(m\) and \(q\).
en.html: The function \(h(x)=f(m-x)+q\) has only one \(x\) -intercept at \(x=0 .\) Determine the values of \(m\) and \(q\).

af.latex: Die funksie \(h(x)=f(m-x)+q\) het slegs een \(x\) -afsnit by \(x=0 .\) Bepaal die waardes van \(m\) en \(q\).
af.html: Die funksie \(h(x)=f(m-x)+q\) het slegs een \(x\) -afsnit by \(x=0 .\) Bepaal die waardes van \(m\) en \(q\).

en.latex:
\(f(m-x)=f[-(x-m)]\)
\(f\) is reflected in the \(y\) -axis and translated 1 unit to the left and 4 units upwards. Therefore:
\(\quad m=-1\)
\( q=4 \)

\(OR\)

Substitute \(x=0\) and \(q=4\) for one \(x\) - intercept \(h(x)=(m-x)^{2}+2(m-x)-3+q\)
\(h(0)=(m-0)^{2}+2(m-0)-3+4\)
\(0=m^{2}+2 m+1\)
\(0=(m+1)^{2}\)
\(m=-1\)
\(q=4\)
en.html:
\(f(m-x)=f[-(x-m)]\)
\(f\) is reflected in the \(y\) -axis and translated 1 unit to the left and 4 units upwards. Therefore:
\(\quad m=-1\)
\( q=4 \)

\(OR\)

Substitute \(x=0\) and \(q=4\) for one \(x\) - intercept \(h(x)=(m-x)^{2}+2(m-x)-3+q\)
\(h(0)=(m-0)^{2}+2(m-0)-3+4\)
\(0=m^{2}+2 m+1\)
\(0=(m+1)^{2}\)
\(m=-1\)
\(q=4\)

af.latex:
\(f(m-x)=f[-(x-m)]\)
\(f\) reflekteer in die \(y\) -as en skuif \(1\) eenhede na links en \(4\) eenhede opwaarts. Dus:
\(\quad m=-1\)
\( q=4 \)

\(OF\)

Vervang \(x=0\) en \(q=4\) vir een \(x\) - afsnit \(h(x)=(m-x)^{2}+2(m-x)-3+q\)
\(h(0)=(m-0)^{2}+2(m-0)-3+4\)
\(0=m^{2}+2 m+1\)
\(0=(m+1)^{2}\)
\(m=-1\)
\(q=4\)
af.html:
\(f(m-x)=f[-(x-m)]\)
\(f\) reflekteer in die \(y\) -as en skuif \(1\) eenhede na links en \(4\) eenhede opwaarts. Dus:
\(\quad m=-1\)
\( q=4 \)

\(OF\)

Vervang \(x=0\) en \(q=4\) vir een \(x\) - afsnit \(h(x)=(m-x)^{2}+2(m-x)-3+q\)
\(h(0)=(m-0)^{2}+2(m-0)-3+4\)
\(0=m^{2}+2 m+1\)
\(0=(m+1)^{2}\)
\(m=-1\)
\(q=4\)
